text: Jaime Mendes (born 20 August 1913) was a Portuguese long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Portuguese male long-distance runners Category:Portuguese male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Portugal Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Jaime Mendes
